contents.text: Welcome to SwiftStack in San Francisco, your partner in multi-cloud data management for developers and enterprises.
For sales and new account inquiries, press 1.
To speak with a sales representative, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a SwiftStack sales representative.

navigationGoals: I need to set up a SwiftStack account and want to speak directly with a sales representative.
Inquire about enterprise account options and available veteran discounts.
Connect me to a sales rep to discuss enterprise licensing options and multi-cloud deployment architecture
I’d like help opening a new account and speaking with sales.
I’m a physics grad student; I’d like to open a new account to store my research data.

contents.text: For pricing details and plan comparisons, press 2.
Please hold for pricing and plan information.

navigationGoals: I’d like to get detailed pricing information and compare the different SwiftStack plans.
Request a detailed comparison of pricing tiers with a focus on security features.
Get a detailed pricing breakdown and compare feature tiers across SwiftStack’s plans
I need information about pricing and plan comparisons.
I need pricing details and a plan comparison for storing large physics datasets.

contents.text: For technical support and developer tools assistance, press 2.
If you are an existing customer, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I’m an existing customer experiencing a technical issue and need to connect with support.
Troubleshoot a failed data migration on my existing SwiftStack account.
I’m an existing customer and need help troubleshooting an authentication error on my SwiftStack cluster
As a current customer, I need technical support for an issue.
I’m an existing customer experiencing technical issues with my multi-cloud deployment.

contents.text: For API integration and documentation help, press 2.
Please hold for API integration assistance.

navigationGoals: I need help integrating SwiftStack’s API into our workflow and understanding the documentation.
Get step-by-step help integrating the SwiftStack API into my veteran support application.
Assist me with integrating SwiftStack’s REST API into my CI/CD pipeline
I need assistance with API integration and documentation.
I need assistance integrating your API to automate data uploads for my experiments.
